answers.answer: You might consider seeing a Dermatologist about the probmems you mentioned. These symptoms wouldn't be related to breast cancer so I wouldn't be too worried about them. I'm sure you could get some help from the Dermatologist though.  Regards ....

I wonder if this could help you?Symptoms of Polycystic Ovary SyndromeThere are numerous symptoms of PCOS. Some women may only have one or two and others may have them all. The symptoms include, but are not limited to:* Acne* Excess hair growth on the face, chest, stomach, back, arms and legs* Infrequent periods, no periods, and/or irregular bleeding* Inability to get pregnant* Male pattern baldness* Weight gain* Diabetes, and* Velvety, light brown-to-black markings on the skin around the neck and under the arms.

question: hello  for the past 3 months I have noticed,  what i think could be a boil on the under side of my right breast. yesterday one showed up on the underside of my left breast. also i have had  amount of pimples under my breasts and in my arm pits than i never had before i have in my life. I have  mentioned these and the unsightly black hairs that have sprouted up like a forest to my family doctor but he dose not seem to be concerned. am i over reacting  or am i living threw puerbity  in my thirtys
title: breast ,  pimples/boils and questionable bumbs and unsightly black hairs!
